meta.name: description
meta.content: Westport Community Schools is a district of three schools from prekindergarten to twelfth grade in Westport, MA.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Westport Community Schools, Westport Schools, Westport Community, Westport Community District, Westport District, Macomber Primary, Macomber Primary School, Westport Elementary School, Westport Elementary, Westport School, Westport Elem, Westport ES, Westport Middle School, Westport Middle, Westport MS, Westport High School, Westport High, Westport HS

li.a: Public Records and Freedom of Information Requests
How to Navigate the New Website

div.marquee: IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT: Please check the COVID-19 Resource page for an important update regarding the district's remote learning plan.

div.p: Thanks to all of our local community partners for supporting the Credit for Life workshop, where students learn about managing money in 'the real world'. (November 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Veterans' Day 2019

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: School Building Committee vice chair Tracy Priestner (left) and chair Dianne Baron (right) picked up a shovel to celebrate the groundbreaking for the new Westport Middle-High School.
(October 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: WJSHS Students showed their school spirit as they participated in a variety of challenges during school spirit week. (December 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Members of the Westport Leadership team work together on a team-building STEM activity during the summer leadership retreat... who can build the tallest standing tower with spaghetti and marshmallows!!!
(August 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Staff from the Macomber Elementary work together on an activity as part of their opening day professional development.
(August 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: WJSHS Custodial Staff member Lori Deston delighted students with her balloon animal skills at the 'carnival-themed' Title I evening.
(October 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Westport seniors participated in what is destined to become a new WJSHS tradition... dinner with a staff member that has had a positive influence on them. (December 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Students in grades 8-12 had an Industry Tour at the Zeiterion Theater. They saw backstage, makeup and dressing rooms, and learned about the various careers that encompass working in a theater. (December 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: The WJSHS talent show is always a big success... highlighting talents of both our students and staff! (December 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: These third grade students will be some of the first to enter the new Westport Middle-High School as fifth graders and complete all grades through graduation... they did a great job leading the Pledge of Allegiance at the ground breaking ceremony.
(October 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Everyone at the Macomber School got into the school spirit dressing in 50's clothing for the 50th day of school. (November 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: WES students practice their rugby skills.
(October 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Students showed their Wildcat Pride in the costumes for the halloween school spirit day! (October 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Macomber students were treated to a puppet show as part of a seven day puppeteer residency where the students will learn to make their own puppets and will design skits. This program has been visiting the Macomber School for a number of years, thanks to support of organizations such as the Westport Cultural Council and Westport Education Foundation.
(October 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Macomber School teacher Mrs. Charpentier is enjoying using some math tools and counting collections while working with a group of first grade students.
(September 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Mac School specialist teachers are working together to offer an integrated specialist program for our preschool students.
(September 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Our elementary ELA and Math coaches Ms. Pontes and Ms. Fitton are joined by assistant Principal Ms. Chesney during back to school night at Westport Elementary.
(September 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Students at the WJSHS held their annual Holiday Pet Bake Sale to raise money to support local animal charities. (December 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Students in Ms. Pereira's class

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Westport Junior/Senior High School students spend Manufacturing Day at North Atlantic Corp-Horner Millwork in Somerset, MA. Students saw the hands-on work of tradesmen and women in woodworking, and design of custom doors, cabinets and windows.
(October 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: The Westport School Committee celebrated our 2020 John and Abigail Adams Scholarship recipients. (November 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Author Bill Harley visits our fourth grade students to talk about character development and creating different plot lines in books. Thanks to Westport Cultural Council, Helen E. Ellis Charitable Trust, Friends of the Westport Library, and the WES-MAC PTO for their generous donations to make this opportunity a reality!
(October 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Kids (and parents) were astonished with the magic show at the carnival-themed Title I evening.
(October 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: The Westport Junior/Senior High School band, under the direction of teacher Mr. Nunes, perform the National Anthem at the Wesport Middle-High School Groundbreaking ceremony.
(October 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: School Business Manager Ms. Rapoza wears many hats, including acting as the coordinator of our food service program. She visited the back to school nights this year to highlight some of the strengths of our lunch program.
(September 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Preschool students at the Macomber Elementary were surprised with a stuffie donated by New Bedford Probation Officer Michael Borden. (December 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Great minds think alike! Mac School PE Teacher Ms. Majhoory and Brody are rocking the same cool t-shirt promoting positive character development.
(September 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: National presented Polly Bath is working this year with our staff on improving strategies to impact school culture and climate.
(August 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Westport School Committee members are always working hard for the students and community... they will even pick up a shovel to get the work done! (From left - School Committee members Melissa Pacheco, Nancy Stanton-Cross, Tony Viveiros, Michelle Orlando and Superintendent Gary Reese) at the Westport Middle-High School groundbreaking ceremony.
(October 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Kindergarten students showed that learning can be FUN with their gingerbread button activity to practice addition skills. (December 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Students showed their support for Down Syndrome Awareness Day.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Our resident therapy dog Quinn and staff member Ms. Cooper lend their paws to the Macomber School kindness poster celebrating 'Start with Hello' week.
(September 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: The WJSHS community wore orange to show their support for Unity Day, where students and staff stand together against bullying and are UNITED for kindness, acceptance and inclusion. (October 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Second graders David and Braydon show off their SUPER powers being recognized as Super Pals!
(September 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Our current Valedictorian Class of 2020, Adam Charest was a guest of Harvard University this morning as the Harvard Book Award recipient.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Students at the Westport Elementary participated in an online survey from the school.
(October 2019)

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 60px; left: 0; width: 728px; height: auto
div.p: Introducing the 2019-2020 Westport Community Schools leadership team... getting ready for the new year at the annual leadership retreat.
(August 2019)

section.p: Infinite Fitness of 221 Weaver Street of Fall River, MA donated a number of workout videos that Westport Community Schools can follow. This also includes a daily warm-up and several days of video workouts. Click title for links.

h1.a: Resources from the Westport Board of Health

section.p: The Westport Board of Health has created this site for residents that has current information regarding the COVID-19.

The Massachusetts Department of Elementary and Secondary received waivers at both the Federal and State level to from the requirement for annual statewide testing (MCAS). There is no MCAS testing this year for students in grades 3-10.

h1.a: A Video Message from WES Staff

section.p: The WES staff have created this message to let everyone know how much they miss them! Check this video out!

h1.a: Work Permits During the Period of School Closure

section.p: We have received notification from the state that work permits can be applied for and provided electronically during this period of school closure. Work permit applications and information can be found under the Student tab on the top of this webpage. Students need to complete the application and provide all required information through email at workpermit@westportschools.org

section.address: Westport Community Schools: 17 Main Road, Westport, MA 02790 Phone: (508) 636-1140
